Html:
Hello again,

When I run optimize function, there is no hit, haste or crit rating listed in additionnal requirement as in bear or lot of other class.

Is it normal?

Thanks

Yes, that's normal. Additional Requirements are made available on a per-model basis. I believe we intend to add Chance to Resist, for the rare rare rare times where you may want to absolutely ensure you can root/cyclone something. Beyond that, you want to optimize DPS rating or Overall rating if you want to maximize your DPS (no reason, that I'm aware of, to optimize or require haste/crit).
